amendment.description: To require reports on the program of child sexual abuse awareness field-initiated grants.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5195 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5195 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S3904; text: CR S3904) To require reports on the program of child sexual abuse awareness field-initiated grants.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5195 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Cornyn.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5195 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
